player.model

Class AddToSixMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.model.AbstractType
      • common.model.AbstractMove
        • player.model.AddToSixMove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AddToSixMove
extends AbstractMove
    Move class used to remove a selection of squares whose tiles add to six.
    Author:
    Nicholas Panzarino
